main_definition: Ever is an adverb used to emphasize that something happens at any time or in all time, often referring to the past.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Always; at any time in history.
meanings_and_examples.example: I've never seen such a beautiful sunset. I hope I get the chance to see an even more stunning one, someday.
Their love was everlasting; they were together for life.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In any situation; regardless of the circumstances.
meanings_and_examples.example: You can always count on me, no matter what challenges come my way. I'll be there for you, ever.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Never before in history or experience.
meanings_and_examples.example: I have never tasted a fruit so sweet and juicy; it must be an everlasting discovery!
